articles.description: Former Australia captain Ricky Ponting said Hardik Pandya was asked to make himself available for the one-off Test of the WTC Final.
articles.content: India haven’t had the services of a seamer all-rounder in Test cricket since Hardik Pandya stopped playing the format due to injuries. Shardul Thakur has tried, but he hasn’t been impressive. The sub… [+815 chars]

articles.author: Richard Martin
articles.title: Keep, loan or sell: The players Man City should allow to leave in the 2023 summer transfer window - Goal.com
articles.description: Manchester City have had a dream season, but it will be the last hurrah for several players, with some leaving by choice and others being shown the door
articles.content: The Premier League champions have had a dream season, but it will be the last hurrah for several players, even if City are reluctant to let some leaveManchester City face a smaller rebuilding job tha… [+608 chars]
